sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnmainimage ( IMAGE_ID /* */ , IMAGE_NM /* */ , IMAGE /* */ , IMAGE_DC /* */ , REFLCT_AT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , IMAGE_FILE /* */ ) VALUES ( #imageId# /* */ , #imageNm# /* */ , #image# /* */ , #imageDc# /* */ , #reflctAt# /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #imageFile# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnmainimage SET IMAGE_ID=#imageId# /* */ , IMAGE_NM=#imageNm# /* */ , IMAGE=#image# /* */ , IMAGE_DC=#imageDc# /* */ , REFLCT_AT=#reflctAt# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ , IMAGE_FILE=#imageFile# /* */ WHERE IMAGE_ID=#imageId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT IMAGE_ID /* */ , IMAGE_NM /* */ , IMAGE /* */ , IMAGE_DC /* */ , REFLCT_AT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , IMAGE_FILE /* */ FROM comtnmainimage WHERE IMAGE_ID=#imageId# /* */

SELECT IMAGE_ID /* */ , IMAGE_NM /* */ , IMAGE /* */ , IMAGE_DC /* */ , REFLCT_AT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , IMAGE_FILE /* */ FROM comtnmainimage WHERE 1=1
IMAGE_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
IMAGE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY IMAGE_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnmainimage WHERE 1=1
IMAGE_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
IMAGE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
